entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
